Summary: spinning object with green and red lights strobbing, sparks like welding comming off the base. Radical angles of extreme speed.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy wufe and I where camping in a cabin on top of Mt Wise, just east of CO. I went outside to make a fire and noticed an bright light directly south and a little west. It seemed closer than all the stars and seemed to move slowly back and forth getting brighter and dimmer. I thought I was seeing things and had my wife varify what I saw. See I did and returned to bed. I contiued watching the object that seemed to have green and red strobing lights. It seemed to be spinnig and that there wIere sparks comming off the bottom of the object. I watched wanderihg what I was seeing it was fairly close. It moved towards Breakenrige and moved suddenly with extreme speed, stopped and headed back in the opposite direction. That freaked me out. I have been hiking in the mountains for a long time and that was a UFO.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Breckenridge
There were no other sightings in Breckenridge on or around September 6th 2006
